architectural_notes: Use aptraavelservices.com as a visual reference for selecting/placing distinct images per section; avoid reusing the same image repeatedly.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Wide travel hero photograph: modern aspirational destination scene (home-hero-banner.realphoto.dim_1600x900.png)
- Travel agency team or planning scene photograph (home-about-section.realphoto.dim_1200x800.png)
- Professional tour guide with travelers photograph (home-tour-guide-section.realphoto.dim_1200x800.png)
- Tour packages featured banner photograph with iconic landmarks (tour-packages-featured.realphoto.dim_1200x800.png)
- European city landmarks travel photograph (tour-package-1-europe.realphoto.dim_800x600.png)
- East/Southeast Asian street/temple/city travel photograph (tour-package-2-asia.realphoto.dim_800x600.png)
- Tropical beach/island resort travel photograph (tour-package-3-tropical.realphoto.dim_800x600.png)
- African safari wildlife landscape travel photograph (tour-package-4-safari.realphoto.dim_800x600.png)
- South American mountains/ruins travel photograph (tour-package-5-south-america.realphoto.dim_800x600.png)
- Australian coast/reef/city travel photograph (tour-package-6-australia.realphoto.dim_800x600.png)
- Romantic honeymoon couple at luxury beach/resort photograph (honeymoon-offer-1.realphoto.dim_800x600.png)
- Romantic Paris/city of love evening photograph (honeymoon-offer-2.realphoto.dim_800x600.png)
- Santorini-style white village sunset romantic photograph (honeymoon-offer-3.realphoto.dim_800x600.png)
- Bali-style villa/rice terrace romantic photograph (honeymoon-offer-4.realphoto.dim_800x600.png)
- Swiss Alps chalet/mountain romantic photograph (honeymoon-offer-5.realphoto.dim_800x600.png)
- Caribbean island beach/green peaks romantic photograph (honeymoon-offer-6.realphoto.dim_800x600.png)

existing_features.title: Generate and add new, distinct travel photography images (no repeats across cards/sections) using https://aptraavelservices.com/ as the visual reference style.
Update the Tour Packages page so each package card uses its own unique image instead of reusing /assets/generated/tour-packages-section-image.realphoto.dim_1200x800.png for every card.
Update the Honeymoon Offers page so each offer card uses a unique image (remove the current 3-image rotation pattern based on offer.id).
Avoid reusing the same section images across multiple pages (e.g., Home vs About, Home vs Tour Guide) by assigning Home page sections their own dedicated images.

new_feature_requests.summary: Update site visuals to use varied (non-repeated) images across sections, using aptraavelservices.com as a design/reference baseline

projectName: Replace repeated travel images with unique visuals (APT reference)
